subject: Re: [junit] Running time consuming JUnit Tests
msgSnippet: So said  h3vj  on  12/4/2002 ... To better answer your question, what is causing these tests to take so long. What external resources do they talk to? Are they
messageBody:
So said h3vj on 12/4/2002

>Hi Friends,
>
>I have JUnit tests suite out of which some suites take about 10 - 15
>minutes to run and some take 1 -2 minutes to run.

To better answer your question, what is causing these tests to take so
long. What external resources do they talk to? Are they blocking on
something?

Perhaps it's not the tests you should change, but the integration
between components involved in the test. When tests take too long to
execute, that often indicates a performance problem you'll encounter in
production. You'd better deal with it now while it's still a
manageable, low-pressure job.

J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
